result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Battery or Threat to Judge, Prosecutor, or Law Enforcement Officer

Per RMW, reset pleas. JA rescheduled to 11/15. Per RMW, reschedule DE's other cases through 11/8 to the PSC on 11/17. kma

8:41 AM Crt Comm: Timothy C. Heckmann, RPR: Melstrom, Clk: K. Anderson, Attorney Holly Rockow in court for State of Wisconsin, Attorney Scott Selmer in court for Jonathan Thomas Mickelson. Defendant Jonathan Thomas Mickelson in court, in custody. INCLUDES 22CF515, 22CM84, 22CM96, 22CM240, 22CM279, 22CM302, 22CM462 and 22CM464. ADA Rockow requests PLEAS. Court sets PLEAS. Bond continues. Adjourned: 8:44 AM. kma

from Kara Rheingans re has not seen or heard from Defendant. Reviewed by RMW.  gll
for bond modification. Filed by Victim. arc   Includes 22CF515, 22CM84, 22CM96, 22CM240, 22CM279, 22CM302, 22CM462, 22CM464.  State objects to bond modification. arc     to RMW.

2:51 PM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Lindabaur. Defendant Jonathan Thomas Mickelson in court.  Attorney Scott Selmer in court for Jonathan Thomas Mickelson.  Attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court for State of Wisconsin. Includes 22CF515, 22CM84, 22CM96, 22CM240, 22CM279, 22CM302, 22CM462, 22CM464. Court reviews file. Motion Hearing on further consideration of competency issue. Atty Selmer addresses competency motion. ADA Rockow responds. Court advises of difference between competency issue in a criminal matter versus involutory commitment due to mental health. Court doesn't find there's enough facts to stay proceeds and denies competency issue at this time, but doesn't preclude from pursuing in the future. Atty Selmer waives time limits for preliminary hearing. Defendant agrees. Court sets PSC and SETC with DA. Atty Selmer requests clarification regarding no contact and no abusive contact provision of bonds. Court advises that on 8/1/22 no contact was ordered. DE doesn't currently have an address. Court gives DE a card for Kara R. regarding stabilization. Adjourned at 3:07 PM.  gll
Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Settlement conference scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Settlement conference on September 7, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Pre-trial/scheduling conference on September 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Appointing Atty Selmer. km

9:11 AM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Fox, Prosecuting attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jonathan Thomas Mickelson in court, in custody. Atty Selmer appears via zoom. Atty Selmer does not represent def on all files. Includes 22CF515, 22CM84, 22CM96, 22CM240, 22CM279, 22CM302, 22CM462 and 22CM464. Atty Selmer has met with the def. Atty Selmer references motion for competency filed in cases 22CM84, 22CM96 and 22CM240 and speaks to that. Court to review the motion.  Court confirms that Def is able to have phone access. Def is instructed to contact the PD's office re: atty appointment on recent case/s. Court finds good cause to extend time limits for PH.
Motion hearing scheduled for August 9, 2022 at 02:45 pm.
Motion hearing on August 9, 2022 at 02:45 pm.
Status conference on August 4, 2022 at 08:30 am.

8:39 AM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Fox, Defendant Jonathan Thomas Mickelson in court, in custody. DE: Atty Selmer, ADA E. Ellenwood. Various cases. Def has not been able to contact the PD's office and is still not feeling well. Atty Selmer has not been able to meet with Def yet. Atty Selmer does not have all the complaints yet. ADA Ellenwood believes discovery has been set. Def in custody on a cash bond. Def to contact PD's office.
Status conference scheduled for August 4, 2022 at 08:30 am.

The original document was titled: Pretrial assessment
The original history event date is: 08-01-2022
Pretrial Assessment report.  arc

Includes 22CM462, 22CM464, and 22CF515.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Melissa H. or her residence or Marilynn R.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.
Status conference on August 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.

2:02 PM CO: RMW, REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Lindabaur. ADA: Michael Becker  DF ATTY:  Jeremiah Harrelson for today Defendant Jonathan Thomas Mickelson appeared by video, in custody. Includes 22CM462, 22CM464, and 22CF515. DE confirms address and DOB. DE understands charges and possible penalties. Waive reading. DE to contact PD to see if he qualifies for their services. Bond argument. Court orders bond. NG in 22CM462 and 22CM464. Court sets STC, as DE has other pending matters before Branch 4. Adjourned at 2:08 PM.  gll
Status conference scheduled for August 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.
